# items

**Instance Property**

The set of dynamic items associated with the gravity behavior.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var items: [any UIDynamicItem] { get }
```

## Managing a gravity behavior’s items

- **addItem(_:)**: Associates the specified dynamic item with the gravity behavior.
- **removeItem(_:)**: Removes the specified dynamic item from the gravity behavior.

items.description: Associates the specified dynamic item with the gravity behavior.
items.name: addItem(_:)

items.description: Removes the specified dynamic item from the gravity behavior.
